title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 143/85 of 18 January 1985 concerning the quantity of high-quality beef and veal from the United States of America and from Canada that may be imported under the arrangements laid down in Regulation (EEC) No 142/85 for 1985
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 143/85
of 18 January 1985
concerning the quantity of high-quality beef and veal from the United States of America and from Canada that may be imported under the arrangements laid down in Regulation (EEC) No 142/85 for 1985
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 19 January 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 January 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 14, 17. 1. 1985, p. 3.
(2) See page 14 of this Official Journal.
(3) OJ No L 241, 13. 9. 1980, p. 5.
(4) OJ No L 186, 13. 7. 1984, p. 17.
(5) OJ No L 340, 28. 12. 1984, p. 52.
